name: NSScriptCoercionHandler
desc: A mechanism for converting one kind of scripting data to another.

items.name: class func shared() -> NSScriptCoercionHandler
items.desc: Returns the shared NSScriptCoercionHandler for the application.

items.name: func coerceValue(Any, to: AnyClass) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns an object of a given class representing a given value.

items.name: func registerCoercer(Any, selector: Selector, toConvertFrom: AnyClass, to: AnyClass)
items.desc: Registers a given object (typically a class) to handle coercions (conversions) from one given class to another.
